caption.center: STATE OF HAWAI'I, Respondent/Plaintiff-Appellee, v. JAMES WAYNE
SHAMBLIN ka STEVEN J. SOPER, Petitioner/Defendant-Appellant. (CR.

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (CR. NO. 06-1-0507(4) and CR. NO. 07-1-0161(4))

center.underline: ORDER REJECTING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
By: McKENNA, J., for the court.[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Recktenwald, C.J., Nakayama, Acoba, Duffy, and McKenna JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: The Application for Writ of Certiorari filed on June 27, 2011 by Petitioner/Defendant-Appellant James Wayne Shamblin aka Steven J. Soper is hereby rejected.Page 1
